languages.text: "Как помазанник Императора я снимаю с тебя приговор Висиря. Культ сломал твою жизнь, но что ты такого сделал? Убил пару раз?"
"As the Emperor's anointed, I hereby overturn the Vizsier's verdict. The cult ruined your life, and for what? For a few mere killings?"
languages.original_text: "Как помазанник Императора я снимаю с тебя приговор Висиря. Культ сломал твою жизнь, но что ты такого сделал? Убил пару раз?"

traits.locale_text: "As the Emperor's anointed, I hereby abolish the Vizsier's verdict. The cult ruined your life, and for what? For killing a couple of people?"
"As the Emperor's anointed, I hereby abolish the Vizsier's verdict. The cult ruined your life, and for what? For killing a couple of people?"
"As the Emperor's anointed, I hereby overturn the Vizsier's verdict. The cult ruined your life, and for what? For a few mere killings?"
"As the Emperor's anointed, I hereby overturn the Vizsier's verdict. The cult ruined your life, and for what? For a few mere killings?"
"As the Emperor's anointed, I hereby overturn the Vizsier's verdict. The cult ruined your life, and for what? For a few mere killings?"
"As the Emperor's anointed, I hereby overturn the Vizsier's verdict. The cult ruined your life, and for what? For a few mere killings?"

languages.text: « En ma qualité qu'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur, j'annule le verdict du vizir. Le culte a ruiné votre vie, et pour quoi ? Quelques meurtres de rien du tout ? »
languages.original_text: "As the Emperor's anointed, I hereby overturn the Vizsier's verdict. The cult ruined your life, and for what? For a few mere killings?"

traits.locale_text: « En ma qualité qu'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur, j'annule le verdict du vizir. Le culte a ruiné votre vie, et pour quoi ? Quelques meurtres de rien du tout ? »

languages.text: «Como {mf|ungido|ungida} del Emperador, declaro anulado el veredicto del Visir. El culto le ha arruinado la vida, ¿y para qué? ¿Por unos cuantos asesinatos?».
languages.original_text: "As the Emperor's anointed, I hereby overturn the Vizsier's verdict. The cult ruined your life, and for what? For a few mere killings?"

traits.locale_text: «Como {mf|ungido|ungida} del Emperador, declaro anulado el veredicto del Visir. El culto le ha arruinado la vida, ¿y para qué? ¿Por unos cuantos asesinatos?».

languages.text: 「皇帝から選定された者として、ここにヴィジールの決定を覆す。カルトは君の人生を台無しにした…その理由は？たかが数人を殺した程度で？」
languages.original_text: "As the Emperor's anointed, I hereby overturn the Vizsier's verdict. The cult ruined your life, and for what? For a few mere killings?"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝から選定された者として、ここにヴィジールの決定を覆す。カルトは君の人生を台無しにした…その理由は？たかが数人を殺した程度で？」

languages.text: “身为帝皇的神选者，我在此推翻宿老的判决。织血罗网毁了你的人生，他们凭什么？就因为你不过是杀了几个人吗？”
languages.original_text: "As the Emperor's anointed, I hereby overturn the Vizsier's verdict. The cult ruined your life, and for what? For a few mere killings?"

traits.locale_text: “身为帝皇的神选者，我在此推翻宿老的判决。织血罗网毁了你的人生，他们凭什么？就因为你不过是杀了几个人吗？”

languages.text: "Als {mf|Gesalbter|Gesalbte} des Imperators mache ich hiermit das Urteil des Wesirs rückgängig. Der Kult hat Euer Leben ruiniert, und wofür? Für einige unwichtige Tode?"
languages.original_text: "As the Emperor's anointed, I hereby overturn the Vizsier's verdict. The cult ruined your life, and for what? For a few mere killings?"

traits.locale_text: "Als {mf|Gesalbter|Gesalbte} des Imperators mache ich hiermit das Urteil des Wesirs rückgängig. Der Kult hat Euer Leben ruiniert, und wofür? Für einige unwichtige Tode?"

languages.text: "İmparator'dan aldığım yetkiye dayanarak Vezir'in kararını geçersiz kılıyorum. Tarikat hayatını mahvetmiş, peki ne için? Birkaç cinayet için mi?"
languages.original_text: "As the Emperor's anointed, I hereby overturn the Vizsier's verdict. The cult ruined your life, and for what? For a few mere killings?"
